name: Havoc (itch) (JWest)
description:
NOTE: To play this game via the *.ino file, a set of Move38's Blinks are required, as well as a Blinks Development kit.

Havoc is a physical action game for Blinks with 2 or more players, based (loosely) on Egg Jarping. Players choose between 3 weapons and fight to the death. Last knight standing is the winner!

Havoc is a work in progress, you can follow it's development on Github.
